description.narrative: 1.Rural growth and Employment: The Project supports a organic food company in the frontier region in China. The Company will have impact and rural reach by procuring from additional households, employing additional rural workers, and create business opportunities for MSMEs. 2. Sustainability and Standards: By investing in JinYuan, IFC will be supporting a Company with a keen desire to contribute to the sustainable rural development and adopt higher food safety/quality standards. 3. Demonstration Effect: The success of the Project is expected to have strong demonstration effect in the organic food industry in China and sets a good example for peers to improve their operational standards.

With a growing customer preference for credible organic foods, larger and branded organic food companies are expected to further strengthen their market position. Jiangxi JinYuan Agriculture Development Co., Ltd (JinYuan or the Company) is planning to build an organic food processing facility in Tonggu county in Jiangxi Province (the Project), a neighboring county to Wanzai where the Companys existing facility is located, to expand its capacity. The Project is estimated to cost about $54 million.

participating-org.narrative: JIANGXI JINYUAN AGRICULTURE DEVELOPMENT CO., LTD.

mailing-address.narrative: Mr. Yu Zun Ning Jiangxi JinYuan Agriculture Development Co., Ltd Wanzai Industrial Park, Yichun City, Jiangxi, China 336100 Tel: +86-795-8913913 Fax: +86-795-8913177 http://www.jyorganic.net

name.narrative: Both the Wanzai and the proposed Tonggu facilities are located in peri-urban settings. The Wanzai facility is located in the county economic development park with a number of residential houses nearby, and the proposed Tonggu facility will be located close to a local village.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

receiver-org.narrative: JIANGXI JINYUAN AGRICULTURE DEVELOPMENT CO., LTD.
